oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Parthenon, Centennial Park, Nashville, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of the Parthenon, a replica of the original located in Centennial Park, Nashville, Tennessee. At right is a statue of Major J.W. Thomas, a leader of Tennessee's Centennial Exposition effort.
A full-scale replica of the Parthenon in Athens was built in 1897, as part of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. In the 1920s, it was rebuilt on the same foundations but in concrete.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greek temples; Parks; Sculpture; Buildings; Galleries and museums
